column4: i want to use the same data for mysql in ubuntu and windows . how can that be done ?
or setup mysql on the network .
ok, that doesn't preclude using the network.
want to access the same db when m on windows and when m on ubuntu
what i mean is just because windows and ubuntu are on the same machine doesn't mean you can't setup mysql with networking capabilities that allows you to access it from both OSes.
can't i change the data folder for ubuntu mysql to a common place and then have the same mysql both sides
hm ! ok ! gotta try changing the mysql data folder link
I wouldn't recommend that -- different versions of mysql operating on your data and all bets are off.
what if i sync the same mysql versino both ways ?
/join #mysql and ask for advice about this there -- it's getting to be offtopic.
cannot says cannot send to channel
